ovdesc.p: This table is updated by the System.

Records of this table are with a key of the Processing date and the keys of the PERIODIC.INTEREST records (for a past date or for the processing date) modified on the Processing date are stored in the records of this table.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Specifies the Processing Date on which the PERIODIC.INTEREST records of a past date or processing date have been modified.
